# 魔法治疗

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mofa-zhiliao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mofa-zhiliao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mofa-zhiliao
mofa-zhiliao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mofa-zhiliao
mofa-zhiliao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
